title: add + use responseHeader and response accessors to SolrQueryResponse
description: To make code easier to understand and modify. Proposed patch against trunk to follow.

comments.author: Christine Poerschke
comments.content: I intend to revise the current patch by adding test cases (in TestSolrQueryResponse factored out in SOLR-8388) for the accessors being added here.

comments.author: ASF subversion and git services
comments.content:
Commit 1720822 from Christine Poerschke in branch 'dev/trunk'
[ https://svn.apache.org/r1720822 ]

SOLR-8317: add responseHeader and response accessors to SolrQueryResponse. TestSolrQueryResponse tests for accessors.
